span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 可理解的： capable of being understood
【例】 military codenames intelligible only to those high-rank commanding officers 只有高级指挥官才能理解的军事暗号
【近】 accessible, apprehensible, comprehensible, fathomable, lucid, understandable
【反】 abstruse, recondite, inscrutable, insensible 难以理解的
【派】 intelligibility n. 可理解性

【记】 intelligent智力 + ble 可，可被智力理解，分析的
